businessProfile.name: Danny's Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 7220 Manatee Ave W, Bradenton, FL 34209, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 7220 Manatee Ave W, Bradenton, FL 34209, USA

reviews.text:
We‚Äôve been coming here every year for vacation for about 4‚Äì5 years now. We actually stumbled upon this place by accident on our very first trip, hungry and passing by, and we instantly fell in love. The atmosphere and food were phenomenal, and it quickly became a tradition for us. Every year since, we‚Äôve ordered multiple times during our stay and have spent hundreds of dollars here. It‚Äôs truly been our favorite pizza spot, worth the extra drive.

Unfortunately, this year‚Äôs experience was extremely disappointing. When we placed our order, one of the items was missing. My dad went to pick everything up, and when we realized the mistake, we called and were given the runaround before finally being told we could come back to get the missing item, with just $5 off. After making the drive again, we got home only to discover the pizza was completely burnt and inedible.

It‚Äôs incredibly sad and frustrating to have our family tradition end on this note, but the service and quality this time were unacceptable. Sadly, we won‚Äôt be returning.

Very friendly! Even before you get in the door, there is a desk outside, greeting you and taking you to your table. The garlic knots are to die for! We got a supreme. It was phenomenal. The crust is very different, but very tasty! Everything was reasonably priced.

Our server, Vivian, was very attentive and very friendly and professional! When we‚Äôre back in the area, this will be on our list.
Absolutely best pizza ever!!! Service was great! Our fav were the calzones, pizza and wings!!! Only got 2 pics because honestly I forgot to take more, I was too exited to dig in.

Came to Danny‚Äôs one of my first nights in the area and went back three more times during the trip. Best pizza in the area. A personal favorite was also the Caesar salad. Fresh, homemade, and lots of flavor. Everything on the menu we tried was delicious. This place is a family favorite because of the great atmosphere and fantastic food, happy I got to try it too. Will definitely be going back and would recommend to anyone interested!
We got a half pepperoni and half margarita pizza. We also got loaded garlic knots. Everything was absolutely fantastic and the best pizza we‚Äôve ever had!!

editorial_summary.overview: Basic, cozy choice for New York-style pies, Italian standards, calzones & heros on garlic bread.

recentReviews.text: Got three pizzas, got back to the Air B&B opened the box and took out the first piece and noticed the bottom was charcoal black burnt, checked the second it was the same way. The small was the only one that wasn't burnt. Contacted them and asked them to remake the two that were burnt (which they did do) but the cheese was beyond well-done... it was at least able to be eaten but we won't go back again.

Danny‚Äôs Pizza is a true local gem! The crust is always baked to perfection‚Äîcrispy on the outside but soft and chewy inside. The sauce has that perfect balance of tangy and savory, and the toppings are always fresh and generously portioned.

Best garlic knots and marinara ever! Love it! They have very fresh salads, great pizza, delicious sandwiches! We had the best service today too! We drive about 40 minutes to get there; it‚Äôs always good!

We‚Äôve been coming down from Ohio for years, and Danny‚Äôs has always been our ‚Äúvacation pizza spot.‚Äù We go twice a trip and spend hundreds of dollars. Fifth year in a row ordering, but apparently that loyalty doesn‚Äôt mean much here. This year, they forgot an item in our order. Took them 10 minutes just to confirm it was even sitting there, and when I asked about the hour round-trip , I was told that wasn‚Äôt their problem. No discount, no apology, just attitude. After 15+ minutes of back and fourth on the phone, they finally offered 50% off the missing item( thought there wasn‚Äôt anything they could do, but made it clear they were doing us some huge favor. We will be taking our business elsewhere. I thought when I called there would be understanding and empathy but instead I was met with distrust of the missing item and lack of hospitality. To add to the frustration‚Ä¶once we arrived home with the correct item, its was burnt and we could not eat.

We‚Äôve been coming here every year for vacation for about 4‚Äì5 years now. We actually stumbled upon this place by accident on our very first trip, hungry and passing by, and we instantly fell in love. The atmosphere and food were phenomenal, and it quickly became a tradition for us. Every year since, we‚Äôve ordered multiple times during our stay and have spent hundreds of dollars here. It‚Äôs truly been our favorite pizza spot, worth the extra drive.

Unfortunately, this year‚Äôs experience was extremely disappointing. When we placed our order, one of the items was missing. My dad went to pick everything up, and when we realized the mistake, we called and were given the runaround before finally being told we could come back to get the missing item, with just $5 off. After making the drive again, we got home only to discover the pizza was completely burnt and inedible.

It‚Äôs incredibly sad and frustrating to have our family tradition end on this note, but the service and quality this time were unacceptable. Sadly, we won‚Äôt be returning.

I absolute muscles but am constantly disappointed by local restaurants. Danny's does not disappoint. Muscles diablo were on point. The broth was so good, I could have drank it with a straw.
The hubs got a meatball calzone. He was equally as happy.
Our server was great and the restaurant is extremely clean.

detailedReviews.author: James Larson
detailedReviews.text: Got three pizzas, got back to the Air B&B opened the box and took out the first piece and noticed the bottom was charcoal black burnt, checked the second it was the same way. The small was the only one that wasn't burnt. Contacted them and asked them to remake the two that were burnt (which they did do) but the cheese was beyond well-done... it was at least able to be eaten but we won't go back again.

detailedReviews.author: Tracey Tussey Mills
detailedReviews.text: Danny‚Äôs Pizza is a true local gem! The crust is always baked to perfection‚Äîcrispy on the outside but soft and chewy inside. The sauce has that perfect balance of tangy and savory, and the toppings are always fresh and generously portioned.

detailedReviews.author: Ralph Sperlunto
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza and great service!

detailedReviews.author: Brittney Rose
detailedReviews.text: Best garlic knots and marinara ever! Love it! They have very fresh salads, great pizza, delicious sandwiches! We had the best service today too! We drive about 40 minutes to get there; it‚Äôs always good!

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Varns
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve been coming down from Ohio for years, and Danny‚Äôs has always been our ‚Äúvacation pizza spot.‚Äù We go twice a trip and spend hundreds of dollars. Fifth year in a row ordering, but apparently that loyalty doesn‚Äôt mean much here. This year, they forgot an item in our order. We will be taking our business elsewhere. I thought when I called there would be understanding and empathy but instead I was met with distrust of the missing item and lack of hospitality. To add to the frustration‚Ä¶once we arrived home with the correct item, its was burnt and we could not eat.

detailedReviews.text:
We‚Äôve been coming here every year for vacation for about 4‚Äì5 years now. We actually stumbled upon this place by accident on our very first trip, hungry and passing by, and we instantly fell in love. The atmosphere and food were phenomenal, and it quickly became a tradition for us. Every year since, we‚Äôve ordered multiple times during our stay and have spent hundreds of dollars here. It‚Äôs truly been our favorite pizza spot, worth the extra drive.

Unfortunately, this year‚Äôs experience was extremely disappointing. When we placed our order, one of the items was missing. My dad went to pick everything up, and when we realized the mistake, we called and were given the runaround before finally being told we could come back to get the missing item, with just $5 off. After making the drive again, we got home only to discover the pizza was completely burnt and inedible.

It‚Äôs incredibly sad and frustrating to have our family tradition end on this note, but the service and quality this time were unacceptable. Sadly, we won‚Äôt be returning.

detailedReviews.author: Jensina Barnes
detailedReviews.text:
I absolute muscles but am constantly disappointed by local restaurants. Danny's does not disappoint. Muscles diablo were on point. The broth was so good, I could have drank it with a straw.
The hubs got a meatball calzone. He was equally as happy.
Our server was great and the restaurant is extremely clean.

detailedReviews.author: Jan Galyon
detailedReviews.text: Very good calzones. Generous size.

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Jetton
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Bradenton.

detailedReviews.author: Vito Modugno
detailedReviews.text: Best NY/NJ style pizza in the Bradenton area. Great service and atmosphere. Hidden gem.

detailedReviews.author: Rick Daughtrey
detailedReviews.text: Dannys supreme is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Fred Palermo
detailedReviews.text: Best NY style pizza in Bradenton

detailedReviews.author: Martha
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food!! Wow! My husband and I were visiting the area, and upon seeing such great reviews decided to try it for ourselves. We were not disappointed! We ordered a Margarita pizza, antipasto, and wings. I would highly recommend all three. My only regret is that we live too far away to make this our go to pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: john robinson
detailedReviews.text: Surprisingly for my first time it was very good. We had a salad and pizzas for my mother's group. All went well.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Carson
detailedReviews.text:
Very friendly! Even before you get in the door, there is a desk outside, greeting you and taking you to your table. The garlic knots are to die for! We got a supreme. It was phenomenal. The crust is very different, but very tasty! Everything was reasonably priced.

Our server, Vivian, was very attentive and very friendly and professional! When we‚Äôre back in the area, this will be on our list.

detailedReviews.author: Janet Ortiz
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Robin Lawler
detailedReviews.text: We had to come twice in one week because it was so good. Thank yall

detailedReviews.author: Tom Theophilopoulos
detailedReviews.text: Dependable service, food. Atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Bill Melvin
detailedReviews.text: This is real New York style pizza served up hot and delicious. I highly recommend this Italian restaurant!  Everything was well taken care of and served with a smile!

detailedReviews.author: Angela Ambrosi
detailedReviews.text: Delicious, huge pizza slices!

detailedReviews.author: Danny R. Swain
detailedReviews.text: We thought the pizza and service were both quite good.

detailedReviews.author: Marianne Hallock
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent...lunch and had spaghetti and meatballs with a side of sausage and ravioli parm
Excellent the garlic knots also delicious
Just want to mention we had Thea just fantastic...made our experience so wonderful....thank you

detailedReviews.author: Lisa George
detailedReviews.text: Danny's has a great neighborhood restaurant feel. Funky decor and great pizza, pasta, salads, and soup. Try it!

detailedReviews.author: John Sharp
detailedReviews.text: Great calzone!  Huge!  Awesome pizza!

detailedReviews.author: The Sandoval Family
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely best pizza ever!!! Service was great! Our fav were the calzones, pizza and wings!!! Only got 2 pics because honestly I forgot to take more, I was too exited to dig in.

detailedReviews.author: Cj A
detailedReviews.text: We love Danny‚Äôs Pizza! It has a great flavor and love the toppings. We get the mushroom and sausage and it‚Äôs fantastic. We splurged on the Large and it was huge!! 5-star taste and service. Try them out!

detailedReviews.author: Rosana Marquez
detailedReviews.text: Buen lugar, lo recomiendo

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Byrne
detailedReviews.text: Danny's is a local staple!! Has been Servicing up great pizza since they opened! Great atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: The Critic
detailedReviews.text: I've been going to Danny's for 16 years. This is really bad. I've ordered a chicken parm hero to go and when I get home, there was no sauce on the hero. When you get a chicken parm hero it comes with cheese and sauce. In the picture the hero clearly has no sauce. You charged me 15 dollars for a chicken parm hero and didnt put sauce on it. Danny's has gone down, his pizza pies aren't the same anymore either, you used to get a big slices of pizza in the pies now you get papa John's size slices. Really disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Captain Carl Snodgrass
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Shawn Brannon
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza I have ever had

detailedReviews.author: Donna McCormick
detailedReviews.text: BEST PIZZA AROUND!  I'M ORIGINALLY FROM JERSEY AND THEIR PIE IS THE BEST!  I'VE TRIED OTHER PLACES NOTHING COMES CLOSE!

detailedReviews.author: Richard Rigg
detailedReviews.text: I grew up at the Jersey Shore and probably tried the best and the worst pizza anywhere. Danny's Pizza nails the Northeast thin crust style pizza we have been begging for here in Florida. The best of the best and truthfully Danny's beats many of the pizza shops I knew in the northeast.. 10 stars from

detailedReviews.author: Roger Jackman
detailedReviews.text: First time ordering pizza from Danny's very good. Great thin crust, generous amount of toppings. Quality ingredients. Very tasty. Family pick it up so I don't know about the atmosphere but the service was excellent quality food if you like New York Pizza, I recommend you try this I don't think you will be disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsey Hall
detailedReviews.text: We got a half pepperoni and half margarita pizza. We also got loaded garlic knots. Everything was absolutely fantastic and the best pizza we‚Äôve ever had!!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Figueroa
detailedReviews.text: Horrible customer service , whole bunch of workers on payroll doing nothing

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Powell
detailedReviews.text: We love Danny's! It's our number one choice for pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Pete Miller
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza üçï great place

detailedReviews.author: Amy Rivera
detailedReviews.text: Probably some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had in a while

detailedReviews.author: David L.
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is great! They always have enough workers to serve the tables and handle a big carry-out business.

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Curry
detailedReviews.text: Best pizzeria that we've found in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Renee Mihailovich
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food, this is our first stop every time we are in the area, the mango habanero wings are the best I‚Äôve ever had. Even though the restaurant was 80 degrees inside, it was still worth it!

detailedReviews.author: Eric Rivera
detailedReviews.text:
I was craving for pizza, so I stopped and bought a pie to take home added half sausage on the pie. Delicious.
The women behind the counter were great üëç

detailedReviews.author: Ashley
detailedReviews.text: I loveeee Danny‚Äôs and it tastes really great and authentic!!

detailedReviews.author: Samuel Francis
detailedReviews.text: Great neighborhood pizzeria.  The food quality is second to none. The meatballs are the size of Baseboards, and the pizza is incredible  ! I highly recommend this place for the whole family.

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Brown
detailedReviews.text:
We are in town at an airbnb. So happy with this place! Ordering was easy,(you talked to a real person), which was a treat. Food arrived promptly, in the delivery time given.

The food, HOLY CRAP!!!!!! This place is so good! Almost like you were in NYC. So happy and pleased with everything.

Hate i have to leave and can't go back again. Great job!!

detailedReviews.author: Cindy Ruelas
detailedReviews.text: Waited for over 30mins others that had family got a seat. Not sure if there racist but wanted to have a great dinner. Had to go some where else to eat.

detailedReviews.author: Harvey Betts
detailedReviews.text: Great food. We had great service. I love coming to visit my mom and dad this is 1 of their favorite places. The staff allowed me to donate a patch to their wall.

detailedReviews.author: PAUL CRONIN
detailedReviews.text: Stopped by for a drink.  Fun atmosphere and bartenders.  Live music was a plus

detailedReviews.author: eileen erwin
detailedReviews.text:
My husband and I go almost every week and the food is excellent! We especially love the pizza and eggplant hoagies as well as the Greek salad! Our favorite pizzas are Margarita, Italian Flag and Eggplant Rollotini but you can‚Äôt go wrong with any option or create your own!
The best NY style thin crust pizza I have found in this area! The service is also special because the people are!

detailedReviews.author: Captain wildman
detailedReviews.text: Glad to see this back to normal, same great people, food and service again.

detailedReviews.author: John Hocken
detailedReviews.text: Expensive

detailedReviews.author: Tim Thomas
detailedReviews.text: Came in on a whim with a large group and Allie was fantastic. Quick service, very reasonable prices, great atmosphere!! Allie answered all our questions and was easy to talk to, perfect services in all aspects.

detailedReviews.author: LM Anders
detailedReviews.text: Great service and great pizza. Always a favorite stop when visiting the area.

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Ostronic
detailedReviews.text: Excellent New York style pizza

detailedReviews.author: Tony Roberts
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza is genuine New York style. Loved it. Great atmosphere for a sit down experience. And the staff is so friendly

detailedReviews.author: Dot Howard
detailedReviews.text: Fills up fast!

detailedReviews.author: Kathleen Gibbons
detailedReviews.text: The food is great.  The young employees can have attitude. Talk too much with each otherand on their phones and ignore the customer.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Rupel
detailedReviews.text: A few mixup with our order but very accommodating.

detailedReviews.author: jessica taylor
detailedReviews.text: No frills, no nonsense, GREAT pizza... A perfect after-beach stop that obviously supports police, fire departments, and EMS personnel from all over. Great prices too.

detailedReviews.author: Brendan G
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza and service is always great!

Been going for years and will continue!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Rector
detailedReviews.text: We tracked to Florida for a quick family trip. Danny‚Äôs pizzeria took great care of our group. We will be back for sure!!

detailedReviews.author: Rob Koon
detailedReviews.text: Always consistently good.

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Jordan
detailedReviews.text: Ate and drank here multiple times and lost my license , they then said they couldn't accept my government printed temporary license , what a joke

detailedReviews.author: James Hart
detailedReviews.text: Didn't accept a government issued I.D. after eat and drinking here multiple times

detailedReviews.author: T Felix
detailedReviews.text: One of the best in Bradenton.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Wright
detailedReviews.text: Exactly what you expect from a pizzeria. This is New York style, large slice pizza. Caesar salad was delicious, seemed like fresh made croutons. Large supreme pizza filled three adults with leftovers. They really load on the toppings. Garlic knots were top notch and only $3.50! Highly recommend if you are in the AMI or Bradenton area.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about Danny's Pizza's perfectly baked crust, which is crispy on the outside and soft and chewy inside, making it a standout feature. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is praised for its exceptional service, with friendly and attentive staff that enhance the dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Danny's Pizza is known for its fresh and generously portioned toppings, which are a hit among patrons. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor customer service and burnt food - review management can address this concern
Lack of empathy and poor handling of order mistakes - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
